The claim that Saudi Arabia has ordered: 450 billion, "$110 billion of which is a military order," was made by President Trump.
The: 450 billion figure includes various goods and services ordered from Saudi Arabia, not just military orders.
There is no evidence to support the clai: 110 billion worth of military goods and services.
The Defense Security Cooperation Agency: s summary of sales to Saudi Arabia under Trump totals a little over $2 billion, not $110 billion.
